did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Minutes, agendas, correspondence, videos, and rosters.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes, agendas, correspondence, and rosters of the Campus Council, Student Assembly, Employee Assembly, and University Assembly, including videos of various events and meetings.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes, agendas, correspondence, and rosters of the Campus Council, Student Assembly, Employee Assembly, and University Assembly, including videos of various events and meetings.
